title: Posture and exercise
brief_description: This film explains muscle action, and the physiology of exercise. Concepts presented include the relation of the nervous system to the skeletal muscles, motor units of work, development of endurance, muscle tonus in relation to posture, and peripheral circulation as it is related to physical efficiency.
